ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_SMITHS] Digest Number 52
ygData.msgSnippet: you should really look at the archives of EQ_Blacksmiths. Of course, you specifically wouldn t want to. Too many flames aimed towards your kind and people who
ygData.messageBody:
you should really look at the archives of EQ_Blacksmiths. Of course, you
specifically wouldn't want to. Too many flames aimed towards your kind and people
who refuse to see the logic of a successful business.

To clarify, this is not a personal attack at you. This is a generalized statement
about smiths (our own kind!) who are ruining the business and refuse to stop.

-Rennin of E'Ci
Trade Council GM

Talthoron@... wrote:

> From: Talthoron@...
>
> That is the business world. You want to know what else? They don't care one
> bit for your failures either. They are buying the successes. No one wantes
> to pay for the ones you screw up on, they are not buying the skewers you used
> to practice with either. If anything, get anrgy with EQ on the sucess ratio.
> Once something is trivial, I think it should be VERY rare that you fail.
>
> Talthoron
